widgets.description: Average request rate over time window
widgets.title: Request Throughput (Avg)

filter.expression: service.name = $service.name AND namespace = $namespace AND envoy.http_conn_manager_prefix = 'ingress_http' AND envoy.response_code_class = '2'
service.name = $service.name AND namespace = $namespace AND envoy.http_conn_manager_prefix = 'ingress_http' AND envoy.response_code_class = '4'
service.name = $service.name AND namespace = $namespace AND envoy.http_conn_manager_prefix = 'ingress_http' AND envoy.response_code_class = '5'

widgets.description: Mean HTTP request latency in milliseconds
widgets.title: Average Response Time

filter.expression: service.name = $service.name AND namespace = $namespace AND envoy.http_conn_manager_prefix = 'ingress_http' AND envoy.response_code_class = '4' OR envoy.response_code_class = '5'

widgets.description: Combined 4xx and 5xx error rate per second

filter.expression: service.name = $service.name AND namespace = $namespace AND envoy.http_conn_manager_prefix = 'ingress_http' AND envoy.response_code_class = '4' OR envoy.response_code_class = '5'

widgets.title: Error Rate

filter.expression: service.name = $service.name AND namespace = $namespace AND envoy.http_conn_manager_prefix = 'ingress_http' AND envoy.response_code_class = '4' OR envoy.response_code_class = '5'

widgets.description: Current active connections to upstream clusters
widgets.title: Upstream Active Connections

filter.expression: service.name = $service.name AND namespace = $namespace AND envoy.response_code_class = '4' OR envoy.response_code_class = '5'

widgets.description: Total data throughput to/from upstream clusters
widgets.title: Upstream Throughput (TX + RX)
